    • Field Detail

      • run

        public boolean run
        Create a boolean that will be used to determine if the update thread should be running or not.

      • route

        public Route route
        The route that this update thread belongs to.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdateThread

        public UpdateThread(Route route)
        Constructor for the UpdateThread.
        Parameters:
        route - The route that this update thread belongs to and will update after a given frequency.

      • UpdateThread

        public UpdateThread(Route route,
                    long updateFrequency)
        Constructor for the UpdateThread.
        Parameters:
        route - The route that this update thread belongs to and will update after a given frequency.
        updateFrequency - How frequency (in milliseconds) the thread should loop. If this is omitted, it will default to 4000 milliseconds (4 seconds).

    • Method Detail

      • thread

        public java.lang.Thread thread()
        This is the thread that repeatedly queries the routematch server for data on the buses, childRoutes, and stops. It loops with the frequency defined by the updateFrequency variable (default of 4000 milliseconds, or 4 seconds).
        Returns:
        The thread. Note that this dies not run the thread, that has to be called separately.
